events.text:
It is imperative that you not interrupt my students on their field trip.
Shoo!!!!

events.question: Eavesdrop on the class field trip?

events.text:
Ahem, so as I was saying... 
Reapers in the [color=#08ff00]Coldheart Kingdom[/color] are familiar with cleaning out corpses wedged in narrow columns.
Such as the column behind me, actually!
They would use a special incantation called [color=#aeffac]dullboy33[/color] to dematerialize and do this job.
The [color=#aeffac]dullboy33[/color] spell would allow the user to clip through all instances of dense matter and vegetation... 
Even a dashing body like that of  [color=#c1ff00]Professor[/color] Grapnel! Hehehe!
